name: Ball Online
description:
A online racing game, which i made ,because i wanted to try making a multiplayer game with the socket.io package i found out about.

Worked pretty well,cheating was just very easy.

I might make a new version, now that i've got some more experience with backend programming and with node.js. That version will use the websockets without socket.io , as using that package might be unnecessary.(2023)
